CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the field to use from the Email Target Object DataSource. This field should be the Id of a User/Lead/Contact! If left empty, it will assume that the DataSource returns a User/Lead/Contact record. If the DataSource does not return a User/Lead/Contact record and this field is empty. The Email Target Object will be ignored if possible. If not possible to ignore, an error is thrown.
CustomField.label: Email Target Object Field
